name: Automotive engineer
description:
We are looking for Automotive Engineer to join The international company-system integrator for specialized robotic vehicles.

Relocation to China.

Duties:

  • Design and plan the aesthetics and technical performance of our electric vehicles and also the electronics and software.
  • Assessing project requirements.
  • Agreeing and negotiating project budgets, timescales and specifications with Management.
  • Developing and implementing test procedures.
  • Using specialist computer modelling software to produce designs.
  • Develop detailed 3D drawings, tooling drawings make and check.
  • Building prototypes of components to carry out tests on.
  • Organizing and carrying out tests, eg to check whether engines and other components will work in different conditions, such as high or low temperatures.
  • Failure analysis and search solutions in construction/material/workmanship for all testing failures.
  • Lead launch of electrical vehicles into mass production and support fabrication and assembly.
  • Solves problems in production to improve the quality and increase the output.
  • Interpreting and analyzing results and data.
  • Assists with cost estimates and project calculations.
  • Researches and presents new processes, new material, new components and new methods that will enhance the final product, improve quality, or lower the cost of the products to Management.
  • Investigating and solving after-sales problems, eg mechanical failures.
  • Providing technical advice and answering queries from clients.
  • Making improvements to vehicles in response to customer feedback.
  • Generates and maintains documentation of development process, modifications, maintenance requirements, and other data.
  • Collaborates with different parties (e.g. supply, quality, manufacturer and certification) on material selection, part design manufacturing feasibility to boost project moving and deliver the automotive systems on time to a higher, than expected level.
  • Technical support for electrical vehicle at various public shows, drives, fairs, marketing or other internal activities.
  • Preparing reports and documentation.
  • Supervising junior staff

Key Requirements:

  • Qualification level of a bachelor's degree in Mechanical (Automotive) or related
  • Minimum (3) years of proved working experience in automotive product development or product management experience.
  • Product life cycle experience preferred.
  • Extremely proficient with computer-aided drafting (SOLIDWORKS, CATIA, and other CAD software) software to create accurate drawings and schematics.
  • Excellent mathematical ability, organizational skills and attention to detail, ability to multi-task efficiently while still meeting deadlines.
  • Thorough understanding of electrical wiring and computer software engineering.
  • Ability to use tools and perform tasks such as soldering, welding, and metal cutting with precision and accuracy.
  • Fluent both at oral and written English.

Terms and conditions

  • Competitive salary and attractive benefits;
  • Five-day week, 8 hours
  • Legalization in accordance with PRC labor legislation;
  • An excellent career opportunity with the High-Tech International company;
  • Opportunity for professional development;
  • Professional and friendly team;
  • International dynamic environment.
  • Salary and bonus levels are determined based on the results of the interview and probationary period.
